messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/20/2006 10:52:10 P.M. Central Standard Time,
lesajm@... writes:

Hi Alyssa! <waving from the Il homeschool group> We are radical
unschoolers, too. :)


::waving back::::: hello fellow groupy LOL

~Alyssa
Slightly crunchy, unschooling Mom to Landen(2) and Gage(5 months)

"Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."

From: SquishyMommy1@...
Date: 03/20/06 19:01:57
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] I'm new my Intro

Hello everyone i was referred to this list from a girl on my
alwaysunschooled list HELLO TO ALL MY FELLOW MEMBERS. I am Alyssa mom to
Landen(2) and
Gage(5 months) we are radical unschoolers in IL. Hope to learn a lot from
all of
you. This looks like a great list.

~Alyssa
Slightly crunchy, unschooling Mom to Landen(2) and Gage(5 months)

"Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."
